description.bannerNoCredits: Automatically generate designs with the click of a button. Contact the administrator to purchase credits.
description.creditBundles: Select one of the bundles below to purchase more credits.
description.creditSpend: Download an itemised list to see what you have spent your credits on.
description.manageBilling: View invoices, review and update payment card.
description.noCredits: To continue generating designs, contact the administrator of your organisation to purchase more credits.
description.purchaseCredits: Purchase additional credits to continue generating designs.
